column2: English
Training
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. We've blown the Reds out of Sint-Annen. Objective One complete. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. Goirle is pretty well cleared. Objective Two complete. Over.
Alpha One to Papa Bear. Come in, Papa. The town of Best is clear. Objective number three complete. Over.
Papa Bear, Alpha Black here. The fourth objective point is free of hostile vehicles. Over.
Papa Bear, Papa Bear, this is Alpha. We've returned to base and are preparing to stand down. Alpha Black out.
This is team Bravo. Our M1A1s have reached Sint-Annen. Over.
Bravo Black to Papa Bear and team Alpha. We've reached Goirle. Over.
Bravo Black here. We've gotten through to Best. Over.
This is Bravo One. We have broken through to Rozenburg. Over.
Roger that, Alpha. We're telling the M1A1s to proceed. Papa Bear out.
Received and understood, Alpha. Good work. We'll relay the message to the M1A1s. HQ out.
Copy that, Alpha Black. Abrams platoon is moving out now. Papa Bear out.
Acknowledged, Alpha. M1A1s are getting clearance to proceed right now. Nice work. HQ out.
Welcome back, Alpha. Excellent work. Your mission is complete. Papa Bear out.
Purple Heart
Walton, AH-64, at Ummanz Airbase.
